slides.quote: [My child] showed me how he does space and egg voice. He does it well! Iâ€™m happy to see he is enjoying your lessons.

slides.quote: She looks so happy and very expressive [in the video]. I love how she seems more confident in her voice.
slides.name: - parent of 14-year-old student
